main.name: Sujal Shah
main.shortDesc: I focus on developing user-friendly web applications that meet the client's requirements, with attention to detail, scalability, and performance.

about.title: AI/ML Enthuasiast
about.about: Hello there! I'm Sujal. I love working with computers especially designing websites, working with 3D models, and creating coding-based projects. Besides that, I enjoy traveling, exploring, and learning about new places and things. I'm also a Photographer and a Drone operator. I believe everything has a story to share, and I try to capture it through the lens.

Leading an initiative by coordinating with undergraduates from different universities to run a five-week mentorship program. Aimed at middle and high school students in Nepal, the program enhances educational accessibility and practical learning in fields such as Computer Science, Mathematics, Economics, Art, and Psychology, with a focus on empowering underprivileged and underrepresented students in the rural community
